name: videoCall
description: ##### this web application is designed on node and react and functions on a single github page

scripts.fronted-windows: npm i concurrently && npm i && cd app/ && npm i && npm start-windows
scripts.fronted-linuxmac: npm i concurrently && npm i && cd app/ && npm i && npm start-linuxmac
scripts.servif: cd applicationServer/ && npm i && node server.ts
scripts.vserif: cd video/server/ && npm i && node index.js
scripts.vfronted: cd video/ && npm i && npm run start
scripts.tsinge-windows: concurrently "npm run servif" "npm run fronted-windows" "npm run vserif" "npm run vfronted"
scripts.tsinge-linuxmac: concurrently "npm run servif" "npm run fronted-linuxmac" "npm run vserif" "npm run vfronted"
